channel.title: How can i make items for donator onley
channel.description: hello i got a 562 rsps and i wanne make vesta and chaotics for donators + how can i do that? help me plaes or send me a good tut

item.title: How can i make items for donator onley
item.dc:creator: @lancerRR lancerRR
item.description:
@lancerRR wrote:

Personally I would just give them to people who donate, that way they can sell them to none-donations, I think that will probably bring in more donations.

As for doing it, I don’t code 562 (I only started coding at all a week ago D:)

But I’m pretty sure it would be something along the lines of

And put that before the equip code within a pair of {'s

then put

else { c.sendMessage("This item is for donators only!"); }

Thats not exactly it, and it will be different for a 562 base anyway, but thats the general idea :S

(Sorry if this is useless, just trying to help xD)

Read full topic
